words_per_minute.description: Label text for the WPM input.

word_color.description: Label text for the word color input.

done_text.description: Label text for the "done text" input.

background_color.description: Label text for the background color input.

text_color.description: Label text for the text color input.

selection_color.description: Label text for the selection color input.

save_button_text.description: The text in the save buttons in the options UI.

retrieved_text_is_null.description: Error message that is used when the retrieved text is null.

unsupported_receive_text_mode.description: Error message that is used when specifying an unsupported `receive_text` mode.

unsupported_message_type.description: Error message that is used when specifying an unsupported message type.

word_elements_iterator_is_null.description: Error message that is used when the word elements iterator is null.

unused_change_key.description: Informational message that is used when a storage key not associated with an input on the RSVP is part of a change.
